features: 💗Ultra Soft Rugs - Features 1.77’’ fluffy plush, pamper your feet with its incredibly soft touch. Without smells and shedding. A comfortable sponge in the middle of the modern rug can soothe your tired feet - You can feel free to lie on the carpet areas.Your feet deserve the softest and most comfortable rug to walk on.

💗Durable Bedroom Rug - The fluffy floor carpet makes bedroom a true value space.The small non-slip dots at the bottom enhances the friction between the area rug and the floor, giving the carpet a certain non-slip function - Your kids or pets can play very happily and comfortably on the modern floor carpet.

💗Perfect decoration - using the latest dyeing process, it has added a little abstract vision on the basis of retaining the modern appearance, add a fresh touch and look to your room. Tie Dyed color design is simple and elegant, which can make for a wonderful addition to any room, and able to slot in with any interior design style easily.

💗Perfect Fit for Any Room - The comfort and warmth the fluffy rug brings to the family.This carpet will create a soft and comfortable place for your baby to play on the floor. Its vivid color and furry appearance are perfect to our room, living room, study room and university dormitory. This rug create a comfortable and warm atmosphere for your home, and add color and fun to life.

💗Easy To Clean - We recommend that you can directly shake off the impurities on the surface of the shaggy carpet or use a vacuum cleaner for daily cleaning. For deep stains, you can choose to wash by hand . After cleaning, place it in a ventilated place to air dry. Note: Vacuum packed, please lay flat and will fluff up back in 2-3 days.

💗Perfect Gift - Shag area rug is very fashionable and beautiful, especially suitable as a bedroom rug by the bed, it can bring warmth to your family and it can create a colorful world for kids. This rug is a perfect gift idea, it is especially used for friend and children gift.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Live Better at Home Luxurious design, matching different style, dress up your home. Committed to bringing safe, high-quality products to our customer to make every day life easier.

Inviting and relax space to your home Our super soft rug is adapted to any scene you want to set up. As a minimalist carpet without losing the sense of design, it not only adds points to the beauty but also brings you a comfortable touch and experience, provide comfort and warmth for your love ones!

Elegant Area Rug for Home Decor Our super soft rug is adapted to any scene you want to set up. As a minimalist carpet without losing the sense of design, it not only adds points to the beauty but also brings you a comfortable touch and experience, provide comfort and warmth for your love ones!

Skin-Friendly Skin -friendly material for evey family members use,even kids or pets Low Maintenance Simply vacuum with the low-power one as needed, or wipe with the damp cloth to get rid of the stains Low Noise The surface velvet pile is not only given a soft feeling but also keeps your feet from the cold floor, helping reduce noise from walking.

Ultra Soft Rug The fluffy area rug features a top layer of soft material, with an upgrade sponge inter layer that brings you softness feeling like stepping out onto a cloud and shields your toes from the cold floor. 1.77" High Pile Step on the plush rug, enjoy the luxurious softness of lying on a cloud and extra warmth and comfort to shield toes from the cold floor Non-Slip Bottom Numerous bead dots on the backing are shaped in flowers to bring more childlike taste to the fluffy carpet, also provide the non slip function that use it more safely
Decent Gift Share the stylish comfort and cozy warmth with your family and friends, creating a comfy spot to babysit, spend time and have fun.

TIPS In order to better protect this plush rug, we use vacuum packaging,it’s normal to see the fibers on the rug is not fluffy enough and there will be some creases. Please lay it flat for 2 to 3 days and wait patiently for its recovery. Please give this cute rug some time to get better!Simply to clean it with a hand-held vacuum to remove dust and dirt;It can easily be taken outside to shake off the dust. For a deeper clean, just wipe with a damp cloth; Only allow your shag rug to fully air dry before next use.If you find some smell of the product when receiving it, it's a normal phenomenon caused by warehouse storage, just please expose it to the air for some time.Images may differ slightly from the actual colour of the product due to different lighting effects of monitors and cameras.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for what we needed
reviews.reviewText: First let me say that if you’re shopping for a rug for your upscale living room, this one is probably not for you. If you’re looking for something for your kiddo’s room, your pets, the garage, etc. then this will be a great fit. This is not luxury. It’s faux luxury at a decent price! We got the black 8x10 for my daughter’s room and she’s in love. When putting in a kid’s room you don’t want expensive because “this is why we can’t have nice things” they ruin everything. The fibers are silky and soft and a bit slippery. I imagine that will fade with time and use. It’s a thin rug that’s very light. Easy to carry. Easy to move. Easy to adjust. Easy to shake out. There are nonslip things on the bottom but we have ours on a rug pad anyway. (If you want a cushier feel then get a deep rug pad and that way you can change out the rug anytime you want while keeping the rug pad the same.) The black is vibrant and a deep black. It came shrink wrapped and folded. We had to wait a few days to open ours so when we did, it did have fold creases and puffy spots. After letting it settle for a couple of hours and my daughter rolling around on it those disappeared. Ours didn’t have a bad odor but I sprayed a light coat of fabric spray anyway. All in all, a good purchase for us and I would recommend for anyone that wants an inexpensive faux luxury item!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This rug is beautiful, super soft, and nice to walk on with bare feet. It arrives folded and vacuum packed and is fairly light weight. But it opens up nicely and turns into a fluffy, attractive addition to any room. And the price is amazing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Blue shag rug; extra soft
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this rug for my 7 year olds room to warm up his wood floors. The color, quality, and size are great for the price. It is nice enough that it doesn’t come off cheap yet inexpensive enough that if my kids mess it up I will buy a new one. My 2 year old and 7 year old are natural born destroyers and this carpet has held up very well. I have spot cleaned it twice and the texture has not messed up like other shag rugs I have had.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The softest rug yet!
reviews.reviewText: This is superb for the price! It has a non-slip backing, it’s soft and comfortable. If you are a person who loves soft textures, this will be you next best friend! I couldn’t stop stroking it! I wanted in position right away, that I pulled out the broom swept and mopped the area just so it could be down! If I had to complain about anything, it would be that I couldn’t get it out of the packaging quick enough. And I bought two! Oh the joy I now have walking in my home now, slippers off and barefeet to enjoy the softness!I love it! Already planning on getting two more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great budget-friendly rug
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a living room rug to go in front of the couch, under the coffee table. My apartment is a bit older, and the carpeting is worn, so I like buying my own rugs both for the visual appeal and a better texture under my feet. This one is nice looking and very soft. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than I expected
reviews.reviewText: This rug replaced a washable rug I purchased elsewhere. It’s soft with nice padding and stays put. I can even use my Dyson without it eating the rug. I’m pleasantly surprised at the quality for the price I paid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Little Rug
reviews.reviewText: It’s very soft. Looks great. Lightweight but perfect for the small area where I needed a rug in my living room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's really nice
reviews.reviewText: Don't be surprised at the packaging. It's vacuum sealed and comes in a small box.Overall the rug is nice and soft. Very cozy to walk on.
